Room.Name: Oceancrest Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking down Oceancrest Avenue, south of Wakarimasu Park.
Room.LongDescription: On the north side of the road, you can see the large Wakarimasu Park, based primarily on ancient oriental architecture. There is a large building in the park a bit to the west along Oceancrest Avenue. On the south side of the road is the Iilandi University.
